# DBDJS.db
## Table Of Contents
- [About](#about)
  - [Setup](#setup)
- [Links](#links)


## About
DBDJS.db is a databse package that aims to be swift and customizable.

## Examples

## Setup
```js
const DBDdb = require("dbdjs.db")
const db = new DBDdb.Database({
    path: "./database/", 
    tables: [{
        name: "test" 
    }] 
})

db.on("ready", () => {
    console.log(`Database ready!`) 
})

db.connect()
```
